```{python mwe, echo = FALSE, results = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, fig.cap = '(ref:mwe)'}
data = {
  'c': ['R', 'T', 'R', 'T'],
  'r': ['1', '1', '2', '2'],
  'x': [1, 1, 1, 1],
  'y': [1, 2, 2, 1]
} 

df = pd.DataFrame(data)

g = sns.FacetGrid(
  df,
  col="c",
  row="r",
  sharex=False,
  sharey=False,
  despine=False,
  subplot_kws=dict(projection='polar'),
  palette="Blues"
)
_ = g.map_dataframe(
  sns.scatterplot,
  x="x",
  y="y"
)
_ = g.set_titles(
  row_template="{row_name}",
  col_template="{col_name}"
)
plt.show()
```
